title: Inside the Parker - Field of Dreams Game! Tatis, Jr. Position Change, Trea Turner All-Time Slide and Bip Roberts on Surging A's
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Field of Dreams Game! Tatis, Jr. Position Change, Trea Turner All-Time Slide and Bip Roberts on Surging A's
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob looks ahead to the "Field of Dreams" Game between the White Sox and Yankees, gives his thoughts on the Padres potentially moving Fernando Tatis, Jr. to the outfield, Dodgers Trea Turner's incredible slide for the ages from this week. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair, Betting on the Bases.

Guests: A's Announcer and former MLB All-Star Bip Roberts discusses the surging A's, and the uncharacteristic deadline deals that made it happen.

Astros Play-by-Play Announcer Robert Ford weighs in in the Astros post All-Star break struggles, and why Houston has become numb to aggressive opposing team fan hate.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
